name: cloud-backup-storage
description: Realizar backup de arquivos sempre que um upload Ã© feito

scripts.deploy-cloud-function: cd deploy && gcloud functions deploy cloudBackupStorage --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-resource [bucketName] --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region southamerica-east1 --set-env-vars BACKUP_BUCKET=gs://[bucketName-destino]

author: Wellington Souza
